name: Joint Forces
description:
I made this game for the Heimat Jam 2021. It's a local 2 player platformer game where you have to help eachother reach a portal at the top of the level to progress to the next level.

Controls;

Player1

a / d = move

w = jump

double tab w to double jump

Player1

left / right = move

up  = jump

double tab up to double jump

Background Music Credit:

https://freesound.org/people/Migfus20/sounds/560448/
